fixes.name: Delta +25 T
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR UseCustomDate = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR EndDateParam = SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    UseCustomDate,
    IF(
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Max Date Exclude] = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[EFFECTIVE_DATE],
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[DELTA25],
        0
    ),
    IF(
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[EFFECTIVE_DATE] = EndDateParam,
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[DELTA25],
        0
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced parameter references with SELECTEDVALUE('ParameterName'[Display As]) and converted Tableau IF nesting to DAX IF. All field references were converted to 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[ColumnName] format. Used VARs for parameter values and RETURN for final IF logic.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references parameters ([Parameters].[Use Custom Date] and [Parameters].[End Date]); per rules, any parameter-based calculation must be a measure.
